title: How to write perfect answers in a BA - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, there are many ways which will help you to score more marks. I'm good in English literature and language so I know what to do for getting attention. You should try to follow the following tips while you write the answers: Most important thing is powerful content. Rather than lofty language.The answer should begin with introduction and ends with Conclusion.Write 5–6 quotation based on the content from its texts.Don't overwrite.Answers should be point to point to attract attention.Whenever there is a need for reference, you should write books name and author.Always have a good handwriting with highlighted topics.Be original in your content writing rather than copying from materials.Read text books and reference books for better content.If you follow these, you will definitely achieve your desired goals. Enjoy your reading.
